name: Car Race (AlecBicheno)
description:
I have changed the game to a low poly 3D endless runner. I have kept 3 major mechanics in the game, these being an endless level, a fuel system, enemies that try to hit you.

WAD to move  ESC to pause

Known issues:

Can sometimes clip through barriers either side, player model continues on death, player model continues when paused, the asset/enemy spawning needs refining.
